reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with a unique pattern and appreciate its soft, luxurious feel. They describe it as thick, comfortable, and not itchy, with a nice weight and good fit. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfectly oversized, others mention it runs a little large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so cute
items.body: such good quality for the price! super cute and grey for work! a little oversized so it’s perfect and comfortable! great for work Read more
items.author: Mandy t

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality!
items.body: This cardigan is really beautiful! It’s thick and made well! It’s almost more like a sweater coat weight. Can be worn alone with a cami underneath or as a sweater coat in the spring and fall. Love it!! I did return it for size. I purchased a small, my normal size, but I wanted it to come down a but longer. I’m 5’6” and 110-115 lbs. I also wanted that really oversized look like the model in the photos. The small definitely works but I just like sweaters really big so I can wrap them around if I’m cold. When returning for size I ended up ordering 3 colors so I could compare and see which I like best! They have so many beautiful colors! Unfortunately I’ve heard Amazon is cracking doen on returns. I hope nit because without an actual storefront you really have to order multiple sizes and colors to try on. This is my first time purchasing from Dokotoo and if all of their products are of this quality I will be ordering more! Read more
items.author: Mar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Boxy fit
items.body: Thick, soft cardigan sweater. Not fuzzy. You can kind of see the color through the white. Bold buttons. I returns because I wanted a cardigan that would fall open to reveal my tshirt underneath. This was a boxy cardigan that laid better closed. Did not meet my needs but I do think that this was a quality item. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE IT!
items.body: I can’t tell you how much I love this cardigan. I get so many compliments and it’s so comfortable and warm. It’s great quality and design. I know it’s going to last me for years. One of my favorite pieces and I would absolutely recommend. I’m plus size XL-2XL and this fits so well and still fashionably oversized without making me feel like a yarn ball. Well worth the price. Read more
items.author: Jenny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is not a China knockoff!!
items.body: Sometimes when you purchase things, you think you are going to get what you see and it ends up being some knockoff that is 10 sizes too small and costs more to return than it did to purchase. Not with this sweater!! I love this sweater so much that I bought another one in a different color. It is super soft!! and it's a heavier somewhat thick quality knit. It's not a cheap, thin, wish I had a heavier sweater kind of sweater. It will definitely help to keep you warm. It looks exactly like what is in the photo and fits well - true to size. It also arrived quickly and did not take a month to receive it. No disappointments at all with this purchase :) Read more
items.author: Sheri Kibbe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick. Good material
items.body: I wear this sweater a lot but mostly as a cardigan. Its very thick. Good quality. Warm. Cute. Read more
items.author: Hagansan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Teacher Wear
items.body: The perfect teacher sweater/cardigan. It’s extremely soft and flexible. It’s thick, but not suffocating, which is something I worry about because I have sensory issues. I always get compliments on it. Read more
items.author: Macie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater, nicely made!
items.body: True to size! Nice weight, fit and style! Gift recipient loved it!!! Read more
items.author: Gypsy2

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Gray, Pink, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Rose, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
